name: Rough-Platform-Spawning-Demo (Day 7: A Game a Day)
description:
This is a VERY rough demo of a multiplayer-only platform racing game

The goal is to collect the most trophies as possible within one minute.  Each character can spawn up to three platforms beneath their feet. If you touch the Repeat item, you can get three more chances. 

Controls:
Player 1: Pink
Move Left: A-key
Move Right: D-key
Jump: W-key
Create Platform: Space

Player2: Blue
Move Left: Left Arrow
Move Right: Right Arrow
Jump: Up Arrow
Create Platform: P-Key

 
I will expand on the game because it seems to have a lot of potential for interesting situations. For now, I reused sound and music from my game, Piñatas. I look forward to turning this idea into a more realized game.

This is the 7th game of my Game a Day challenge. I'll be making a game from scratch every single day until July 1st. To learn more about it, click this link. https://anxietymonstergames.wordpress.com/2018/06/01/a-game-a-day-blog/
